CustomField.description: Used to sum the SOE Milestone fields. This is used for the validation to check that the total milestone % is equal to 100
CustomField.formula: Advance_along_with_PO_SOF__c + Intimation_of_Readiness_of_Dispatch__c + Delivery__c + Installation_Commissioning__c + UAT__c + Post_UAT__c
CustomField.label: SOE Milestone Formula
